tool.name: OTB.ComputeOGRLayersFeaturesStatistics
tool.description: Compute statistics of the features in a set of OGR Layers
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayinshp False output_data_outstats $output_data_outstats name OTB.ComputeOGRLayersFeaturesStatistics inshp $inshp feat '$feat' prefer $prefer response $response outputType_outstats $OutputSection_outstats.outputType_outstats transmissionMode_outstats $OutputSection_outstats.transmissionMode_outstats

param.name: inshp
param.label: Name of the input shapefile
param.help: Name of the input shapefile The following data types are allowed in the txt file: zip, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: feat
param.label: List of features to consider for statistics.
param.help: List of features to consider for statistics.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_outstats
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_outstats
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Compute statistics (mean and standard deviation) of the features in a set of OGR Layers, and write them in an XML file. This XML file can then be used by the training application.
